mapper.select: SELECT SUM(buyNum) totalQuantity,goodsName,price,goodsImg FROM bm_inordergoodslist a, bm_inorderlist b,bm_member c WHERE a.orderId = b.orderId AND sellerId = c.id AND c.tel = #{tel} GROUP BY goodsName,goodsImg,price

SELECT goodsImgUrl,goodsName,price,cname,bname,mechanismName,qualityPeriod from bm_goods a,bm_specification b,sys_mechanism c,bm_warehouse d,bm_brand e,bm_category f WHERE b.goodsId = a.id AND a.brandId = e.id AND a.warehouseCode = d.warehouseCode AND c.id = d.mechanismid and a.categoryId = f.id AND a.id = #{id}
